message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $75 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $85.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
